sigma_title: Script File Execution via WScript or CScript Tool
elastic_lucene: (winlog.channel:Security AND winlog.event_id:4688 AND process.executable:(*\\cscript.exe OR *\\wscript.exe) AND process.command_line:(*.vbs* OR *.js* OR *\/\/E\:jscript* OR *\/\/E\:vbscript*))

sigma_title: Persistence by Adding a User to Local Administrator Group
elastic_lucene: (winlog.channel:Security AND winlog.event_id:4732 AND (winlog.event_data.GroupName:Administrators OR group.name:Administrators OR winlog.event_data.SecurityID:S\-1\-5\-32\-544))

sigma_title: TCP Connection Creating via PowerShell Script

elastic_lucene: (winlog.channel:Security AND winlog.event_id:4688 AND process.command_line:(*asktgt* AND *user\:* AND *\/ptt*))

sigma_title: Code Execution via Microsoft Build EngineÂ
Suspicious Credential Vault Client Library Load
Execution Through Module Load via PowerShell
elastic_lucene: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Powershell\/Operational  AND winlog.event_id:(4104 OR 4103) AND message:*Reflection* AND message:*Assembly* AND message:*Load*)

sigma_title: Symmetric Cryptography Encryptor and Decryptor Utilization via PowerShell
elastic_lucene: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Powershell\/Operational  AND winlog.event_id:(4103 OR 4104) AND message:*Security* AND message:*Cryptography* AND message:(*CreateDecryptor* OR *CreateEncryptor*))

sigma_title: Suspicious DISM Core Framework Portable Executable Load
